text: "Opportunities (Let's Make Lots of Money)" is a 1985 song by Pet Shop Boys and taken from their debut studio album Please. It went to number 2 in New Zealand, number 10 in the United States, number 11 in the United Kingdom, number 14 in Ireland and Spain, number 22 in Canada, number 25 in Germany and number 30 in the Netherlands. ==Track listings== ===7" (UK) (1985 release) (Parlophone R6097)=== * A.
